title: Hero Section renders with animation and interactive elements
description: Verify that the Hero Section loads correctly with the animated introduction, profile image, call-to-action buttons, and social media links visible and functional.

steps.description: Navigate to the homepage
Check the Hero Section is visible with animated introduction text
Verify the profile image is displayed
Check call-to-action buttons are rendered and clickable
Verify social media integration links are present and navigate to correct URLs

title: About Section displays skills badges and timeline correctly
description: Validate that the About Section shows all skills as badges, educational background, and a professional experience timeline with interactive UI elements.

steps.description: Navigate to the About Section
Verify skills badges are displayed with proper labels and icons
Check the educational background details are present
Verify professional experience timeline is rendered with correct company names, dates, and achievements
Interact with timeline UI elements to confirm interactivity
Ensure timeline expands/collapses or highlights on user interaction

title: Advanced Projects search and filter functionality
description: Ensure real-time search, category filtering, status indicators, and technology tags work correctly and update the project list without errors.

steps.description: Open Advanced Projects section
Type a keyword into the project search input
Verify that the project list updates in real-time showing only matching projects
Select a category filter from the filter options
Confirm the project list shows only projects in the selected category
Check that status indicators (e.g., completed, in-progress) appear correctly on projects
Verify technology tags are displayed and correct for each project
Clear search and filters
Ensure the full project list is restored

title: Certifications display with badges and valid verification links
description: Verify certification items show achievement badges and that clicking verification links opens a valid verification page.

steps.description: Navigate to Certifications section
Check that each certification has an achievement badge visible
Click on the verification link for a certification
Verify the verification link opens a valid page without errors

title: Interactive Blog and Testimonials sections render and allow interaction
description: Confirm Blog posts and Testimonials are loaded, displayed properly, and test interactivity like pagination, opening full posts, and testimonial navigation.

steps.description: Navigate to Blog section
Ensure blog articles display title, summary, and publication date
Click to open a full blog post
Verify full blog content is displayed correctly
Use pagination or load more functionality in Blog
Check new blog posts load without errors
Navigate to Testimonials section
Verify testimonials are displayed with author names and messages
Use navigation to move through testimonials (e.g., arrows or swipe)
Ensure testimonials update smoothly and remain readable

title: Contact Form submits with EmailJS, handles validation and errors
description: Test the contact form with valid and invalid inputs to verify form validation, EmailJS integration for message sending, and display of success/error notifications.

steps.description: Navigate to Contact Form
Submit empty form fields
Ensure validation errors are displayed for required fields
Fill the form with invalid email and incomplete information
Check appropriate validation error messages are shown
Fill the form with valid inputs
Submit the form
Verify EmailJS successfully sends the message
Check a success notification/toast is displayed upon successful submission
Simulate EmailJS service failure or network error
Verify error notification is displayed and the form remains usable

title: Dark/Light Theme Toggle respects system preference and persists choice
description: Test theme toggling functionality including system preference detection on initial load and persistence of user choice across sessions.

steps.description: Set system theme preference to dark
Load the website
Verify the site loads with dark theme enabled by default
Use the theme toggle button to switch to light theme
Confirm theme changes visually to light mode
Reload the website
Verify the previously selected light theme persists despite system preference
Toggle back to dark theme
Check visual update and persistence on reload again

title: Progressive Web App offline support and install prompt
description: Validate service worker caching enables offline functionality and PWA install prompt appears and works as expected.

steps.description: Load the website with network connected
Open DevTools and simulate offline mode
Reload the webpage while offline
Verify the website loads correctly from cache without errors
Check core assets and pages are available offline
Trigger PWA install prompt (e.g., on first visit or via user action)
Ensure install prompt is shown to the user
Accept the PWA installation
Confirm the app installs successfully and launches as standalone

title: SEO meta tags, structured data, and Open Graph tags are correctly implemented
description: Verify all essential SEO metadata, JSON-LD structured data, and Open Graph tags are present and valid for key pages.

steps.description: Load the homepage and key site pages
Check HTML head for presence of meta description, title, canonical tags
Validate JSON-LD structured data is present and correctly formatted
Verify Open Graph protocol tags (og:title, og:description, og:image) exist and have appropriate content
Use SEO validation tools (e.g., Google Structured Data Testing Tool) to confirm no errors

title: Accessibility compliance and ARIA attributes correctness
description: Check that all interactive components and pages meet WCAG standards with proper use of semantic HTML and ARIA attributes, supporting screen readers and keyboard navigation.

steps.description: Navigate through the website using keyboard only (Tab, Shift+Tab, Enter)
Ensure all interactive elements are reachable and usable via keyboard
Use a screen reader to navigate key pages and components
Check screen reader announces labels and roles correctly
Verify the presence of appropriate ARIA attributes on interactive UI elements
Ensure color contrast meets accessibility standards

title: Animations and transitions perform smoothly without lag
description: Test all animations and transitions such as the particle background, section animations, and interactive UI elements for smooth performance and absence of jank.

steps.description: Load the homepage with animations enabled
Verify animated particle background renders without visual glitches
Observe call-to-action button and intro animations for smooth transitions
Interact with all animated UI elements (e.g., project filtering animations, theme toggle transitions)
Confirm all animations run fluidly with stable frame rates

title: Error boundary catches and handles runtime errors gracefully
description: Simulate errors in components and verify the Error Boundary component captures them and displays a user-friendly fallback UI without crashing the app.

steps.description: Trigger a runtime error in a child component (e.g., throw exception during render)
Verify the Error Boundary displays fallback UI instead of crashing
Check if user can continue interacting with other parts of the app
Trigger error recovery if supported (e.g., retry button)
Confirm the component recovers or reloads correctly

title: Notification system displays and dismisses toast messages correctly
description: Verify toast notifications appear on relevant user actions (e.g., form submissions) and can be dismissed manually or disappear automatically.

steps.description: Trigger a success notification (e.g., form submission success)
Verify toast message is displayed with correct content
Dismiss the notification manually
Confirm the notification disappears from view
Trigger an error notification (e.g., failed form submission)
Ensure error toast is displayed properly
Verify the notification automatically disappears after a timeout if not dismissed

title: Mobile-first responsive design and collapsible mobile menu functionality
description: Check that the website renders optimally on mobile devices and the collapsible mobile navigation menu opens, closes, and navigates smoothly.

steps.description: Open the website on various mobile devices or using responsive emulator
Verify layout adapts correctly to small screen sizes
Tap the mobile menu icon to open the navigation menu
Confirm that the mobile menu expands smoothly
Tap navigation links inside the menu
Ensure navigation scrolls to correct sections
Close the mobile menu by tapping outside or on close button
Verify menu collapses and interactive elements are accessible

title: Performance monitoring reports web vitals and displays analytics modal
description: Validate that performance metrics such as First Contentful Paint, Largest Contentful Paint, and Cumulative Layout Shift are correctly tracked and the analytics dashboard modal presents this data.

steps.description: Load the website and trigger performance monitoring
Check that web vitals data is collected without error
Open the analytics modal/dashboard
Verify performance metrics (FCP, LCP, CLS) are displayed accurately
Confirm user interaction metrics and page views are tracked and shown

title: Image optimization and lazy loading function correctly
description: Confirm that images are loaded lazily as they enter the viewport and optimized image components serve appropriate resolutions without layout shifts.

steps.description: Navigate to a page with multiple images (e.g., Projects or Blog section)
Verify images outside viewport are not loaded immediately
Scroll through the page
Confirm images load as they come into view without delays
Check image sizes are optimized by inspecting network requests
Ensure no layout shift occurs when images load
